data.text: Raajii waaʼee Nanawwee dubbatame. Kitaaba mulʼata Naahoom Elqooshicha.
Waaqayyo Waaqa hinaafuu fi Waaqa haaloo baʼuu dha;
Waaqayyo dheekkamuuf hin jarjaru; humni isaa immoo guddaa dha;
Fuula isaa duratti tulluuwwan ni kirkiru;
Eenyutu dheekkamsa isaa dura dhaabachuu dandaʼa?
Ani amma waanjoo isaanii gurmuu keessan irraa nan cabsa;
Yaa Nanawwee, Waaqayyo akkana jedhee waaʼee kee ajaja kennee jira:
Kunoo, miilli nama oduu gaarii fidu,
